Active tugboat between the US and Israel while the slaughter continues - KKE (M -L)

Author: ΚΚΕ(μ-λ)
Categories: Παλαιστίνη
Description: We have now entered the sixth month of the Genocystic slaughter of the Zionist state of Israel against the people of Palestine in the Gaza Strip. The unstoppable daily bombings turn the area into ruins full of murdered civilians, while the Israeli war council was approved and the invasion of Rafa.
Published Time: 2024-03-23T00:00:00+08:00
Tags: ps955
Type: article
Images: 000000.jpg?anchor=center&mode=crop&width=900&rnd=133555365427930000

<The image of this location is in the list above, but in order to protect the site's traffic costs, it cannot be displayed here, sorry.>

We have now entered the sixth month of the Genocystic slaughter of the Zionist state of Israel against the people of Palestine in the Gaza Strip. The unstoppable daily bombings turn the area into ruins full of murdered civilians, while the Israeli war council was approved and the invasion of Rafa. At the same time, Israel uses hunger as a weapon against the Palestinian people, but also as many analysts point out, as a tool for pressure in negotiations with Hamas. In the same direction - the pressure - is used by the Zionists and the threat of the invasion of Rafa, which also reflects the will of the extreme reactionary group of Zionists ruled by Israel and has incorporated the practices of German Nazis into its policies.

Maximum aim of the Zionists, to use genocidal policy as a means of massively displacing Palestinians by the Gaza Strip. This goal, despite the suffering of the Palestinian people, is not easily achieved at all, not mainly because it finds the reactionary Arab regimes opposite to "do not load the problem". But because the people of Gaza persistently refuses to abandon the place where they live and become a refugee for the second time.

USA: involvement and targets

The subtitle does not refer to the US involvement in the massacre that evolves through continuing and massive power with every murderous iron from Zionist Israel. This continues and will continue, and is probably a lever, rumors that the US may stop military aid to Tel Aviv.

The highest national priority now is to tackle the barbaric Zionist aggression and the genocidal and starvation war of the occupation against our people in the Gaza Strip and to deal with the crimes of its settlers on the West Bank and under Occupation Al-Kund . Jerusalem) -especially in the al -ACSA mosque -and the significant dangers facing our national case -at the forefront of which the evolving risk of displacement is located ».

The Americans seem to want with a double replacement (Israeli, Palestinian Authority) to resurrect the plan of a Bandustan state for the Palestinians, the protectorate of Israel, the Arab regimes and of course their own and in the second year to open the way In the forefront of the Israeli-Arab regimes approach, aimed at Iran and in the background of Russia and China.

In addition, as they are, they use "humanitarian aid" to obtain metaphorically and literally direct access to the Gaza Strip. With the Greek Cypriot leadership, double slavery in the US and Israel, and faithfully following the ruling class of our country, it has turned Cyprus into a Xionist vineyard and at the same time laying US plans for their presence in the region. Let us note here that through the "Amalthea" operation, only 200 tonnes of food were transferred to the lane, which can be carried by 10 trucks from land, at the same time that Israel refuses to enter the lane of hundreds of trucks from the crossing of Rafa.

Source: https://www.kkeml.gr/ps959/energi-i-dielkistinda-metaksy-ipa-kai-israil/

Chaco Neighbors and deputies united by the Food Emergency

Author: carga
Categories: Política
Description: The activity was carried out in conjunction with the community and deputies of the Chaco Front, where legislators Pía Chiacchio Cavanna and Rodolfo Schwartz proposed to discuss the project of their authorship, of Law No. 448/24
Published Time: 2024-03-23T00:00:00+08:00
Type: article
Images: 000000.jpg

<The image of this location is in the list above, but in order to protect the site's traffic costs, it cannot be displayed here, sorry.>

The activity was carried out in conjunction with the community and deputies of the Chaco Front, where legislators Pía Chiacchio Cavanna and Rodolfo Schwartz proposed to discuss the project of their authorship, of Law No. 448/24 "of emergency and food sovereignty", and receive ideas , modifications and proposals for your conversion into law.

The event was attended by provincial deputies Mariela Quirós, Analía Flores, Gladys González and Rodrigo Ocampo, as well as with the community participation of rural producers of the great resistance, teachers, representatives of social organizations, clubs, cooks of dining rooms and picnic Iglesias, among others.

During the day it was briefly explained what the bill consists of and the critical situation that our province is going through as a result of the adjustment policies applied by the National Government, which has exacerbated hunger, especially in the most vulnerable sectors of the most vulnerable sectors of the most vulnerable sectors of the Chaco

Deputy Pía Chiacchio Cavanna detailed a detailed report on social assistance provided by the previous government, which benefited more than three hundred thousand families with different devices, through national and provincial programs, from school dining rooms to food assistance for families with celiachy, among others , which have stopped receiving since last December 10.

For his part, Deputy Rodolfo Schwartz explained that the project seeks to strengthen the provincial production and marketing of foods of small and medium producers and merchants, to supply school and community canteens, and include an accessible agreed prices policy for the population.

During the forum, the various expressions of the Center for Retirees, representatives of social organizations, and delegates of the CGT and workers of recovered companies were heard. His testimonies highlighted the urgency of changing the current situation.

The first "Forum for the Food Emergency" had been carried out a week ago, in general San Martín. The deputies and deputies plan to explore the province to collect needs, contributions and proposals for the approval of the project in the Chaco Legislature.

To learn more about the bill, we invite you to enter the following link: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ZE70IpFggrs9j-qrpHEwCJY1c28EPNEe/view?usp=drivesdk

Source: https://pcr.org.ar/nota/chaco-vecinos-y-diputados-unidos-por-la-emergencia-alimentaria/

[Menu]#[Previous Article]#[Next]

To give way through the mass struggle! - KKE (M-L)

Author: ΚΚΕ(μ-λ)
Categories: Με (ευρω)αυταπάτες θέλουν να ελέγξουν την κοινωνική οργή!
Description: European Council President Charles Michelle proclaims that "if he wants peace, Europe needs to be prepared for war" and that we need to "go into war economy" while at the same time, the long -haired delusions and lies for lies for lies. The "Europe of the Peoples" are re -employed by the rulers to drag their peoples to the upcoming electoral farce.
Published Time: 2024-03-23T00:00:00+08:00
Tags: ps955
Type: article
Images: 000000.jpg?anchor=center&mode=crop&width=900&rnd=133555365800600000

<The image of this location is in the list above, but in order to protect the site's traffic costs, it cannot be displayed here, sorry.>

The Minister of Education of Germany says schools must prepare students for the possibility of war, at the same time that the local bourgeois political system is dancing to the rhythm of June. European Council President Charles Michelle proclaims that "if he wants peace, Europe needs to be prepared for war" and that we need to "go into war economy" while at the same time, the long -haired delusions and lies for lies for lies. The "Europe of the Peoples" are re -employed by the rulers to drag their peoples to the upcoming electoral farce. So here, domestic starry is getting ready to wear the "democratic" of the costumes, at the same time as plans to dress the world of work and youth in variations whenever required.

Continuing to the contradictions and inherent impasses, therefore, the European imperialist building is moving towards the ballot box to highlight its decorative instrument, to make it clear from its disgusting face, which has been widely revealed. For fiery reasons for "democracy" and "participation", the leaders of the imperialist metropolis are preparing to appear, who recently landed the army on the streets against the uprisings of their peoples and criminalized every expression of solidarity with the heroic. The protagonists of anti-communist memorandums and the equation of communism-nazism, which again nourish the darkest darkness of the past of human history, which have normalized fascism and war in the daily lives of their peoples, are preparing to talk about the "future". Political representatives of local capitalism are also followed by their feet.

Both the ND government and the other opposition bourgeois parties, then, are taking positions in view of the European elections. It could not be done otherwise, since beyond the need to integrate the people into the imperialist European ideals who have been called upon to serve over time, they also realize that they have to prove their attachment and give all sorts of credentials to Europeans 'patrons' "At a time, in fact, great geopolitical turmoil and strong imbalances in the latter's relations with the other transatlantic pillar of the country's dependency, American imperialists.

That is why, as shocking the grandeur of a parent who has lost his child and struggles for justification, so unforgivable is his miserable exploitation in the context of imperialist contradictions or the need for European bosses to consider their slaves! Even more, they are devastating for the working class, the people and the youth. The illusions that have been cultivated lately by the bourgeois opposition of SYRIZA, PASOK, the New Left and others, but also by the forces of the varied Left, that the EU and the EU and Her parliament is about the "guardian angel" of popular rights, that we will punish the "bad" government of Mitsotakis addressing the "good" Europeans who protect us.

Of course, another that the left of the defeat and submission do not want! Characteristic of the case of the KKE, which is in a hurry to close the youth struggle to wear its electoral tie, with the local elections finished, turned her eyes there and all her action has revolved for months around the "mother" of battles. " Some organizations have even arrived to draw on Eurobonds in the midst of student uprising! All of them, in front of the election and delusions, are running once again to give their legitimacy to the ballot box of imperialist wolves and to assist in the struggle of the sovereigns against the "curse" abstention!

Because the forces of the system of dependence and exploitation are well aware that in today's phase they are marching in the incandescent territory of social wrath and indignation that is increasingly expanding and multiplying on existing terms of volatility of the urban political scene. Thus, in the tricks produced by the geopolitical position of our bourgeoisie, but also, in relation to the previous one, in the vibration of a diverted bumpy economy, which stands weak in front of "extrinsic threats", according to a recent report by JP Morgan, The data of the rage of the "below" will be constantly added.

The massive disapproval of the cover -up of the Tempi Inquiry Committee is precisely. With poverty and poverty spread out, with capitalist accuracy kneeling the social majority, with the government announcing the end of various benefits and passes and submission to "fiscal stability", with the people being exiled to hospitals and hospitals and hospitals. Any ability to access health care, with the long -awaited increase in the minimum wage proven to be a mockery that has already disappeared, it is clear that waves of dissatisfaction are being formed in the popular masses, which can be controlled, as long as they are struggling to be trapped in the ballot box. and in painless or even dangerous solutions.

The brutality of the repressive forces against students who insist on occupations against the Pierrakakis law, threats to imprisonment against the "unruly" teachers who deny evaluation proves that the lawmakers will be more and more often resorted to "To halt the social processes that are evolving, because they simply have no choice. "In front of the law the road is not allowed" is the message they seek to send, because this outlet is scared!

We have to strengthen this way out! By gathering the forces and fighters who insist that nothing is over, that the struggle for the overthrow of the Pierrakakis law must continue, that the common front of the common front of workers and youth. With the coincidence of those tendencies who refuse to legitimize the miserable construct of the Eurocup of the imperialists, shouting everywhere the choice of the electoral farce, showing the path of the mass struggle against the EU and NATO bonds. To finally serve the prospect of the confrontation of the working class, the people and the youth with the regime of imperialist dependence, the prospect of revolutionary overthrow of exploitation and social liberation!

Source: https://www.kkeml.gr/ps959/na-dosoume-dieksodous-mesa-apo-ti-maziki-pali/

The culprits continue the concealment business - KKE (M -L)

Author: ΚΚΕ(μ-λ)
Categories: Έγκλημα στα Τέμπη
Description: On the issue of Tempi, the government wants to achieve two, conflicting, goals: to conceal the crime, but also to calm the anger of both relatives and people. And the pie and the dog grass, that is.
Published Time: 2024-03-23T00:00:00+08:00
Tags: ps955
Type: article
Images: 000000.jpg?anchor=center&mode=crop&width=900&rnd=133555366563770000

<The image of this location is in the list above, but in order to protect the site's traffic costs, it cannot be displayed here, sorry.>

After completing the work of the House of Inquiry Committee on the Crime of Tempi, based on the publicity of the signatures issue and with the recent black anniversary and anger of the world expressed in the strike on 28 February, the climate of the climate. It was burdened for the government and made it difficult for the concealment operation.

The government, as expected, passed on the counterattack and moved on two main axes: first accused the opposition of tooling tragedy and using the dead and pain of their relatives in its political confrontation with it (political leeches, the government described them. Marinakis). And secondly, he was presented as the only one who could truly satisfy the request of the relatives and the whole people, for complete clarification of the case and punishment of the perpetrators with real and objective elements.

Mitsotakis himself also moved in these directions in his interview with SKAI. Taking the well -known, apparently multipurpose "human" communication staff, he said he did not forget the images and smells the next day, when he went to the scene of the crime, which was imposed by the human need to support the cranes somewhere for the crime. to lift the wagons and restore the carcasses. His humanity was exhausted somewhere there, because he was very cynical when he said that the railway is as safe as he could be, without excluding, in fact, other dead in the future ...

The same directions were followed, with relatively aggressive tones, the government in the debate in Parliament on the finding of the examination, namely ND! A finding that he found no other responsible despite the human factor and ... the evil at a time when they were brought up and became looming mistakes and omissions that led to the conflict.

In fact, the ND turned all over the people. He knows that the crime of Tempi has caused his anger, which has repeatedly expressed on the street, at very massive rallies, but even in the one and a half million signatures, despite the objections we have about them.

What worries her, much more than she wants to show, is that this wrath of the world accumulates and concerns almost all aspects of his life. One of all the issues that opens up daily on the people's and youth rights can become the drop that will make the glass overflow, with unpredictable consequences.

Thus, in the issue of Tempi, it wants to achieve two conflicting goals: to conceal the crime, to rid its ministers and itself from political responsibilities and to calm the anger of both relatives and people. And the pie and the dog grass, that is, something that if she has hoped to succeed is only because of her domination in the urban political scene and, above all, because of the absence of a popular movement so massive, contemplative and relentless that she will force her to do back.

In the debate in the House, her superiority was obvious, not only because she dared and went on the counterattack, but also because " Bullion "Against her, who was written in the press, probably not even touched by SYRIZA, PASOK, New Left and Freedom Cruise were far from expressing the popular feeling of concealment. And how could they, after all, have to be held accountable for what they did or did not do when they were in government positions, preparing the road that led to the crime.

As for the KKE, he defended his proposal for the establishment of the Inquiry Committee, which was implemented, saying that he had no illusions because he knew his limits, but was validated because the effort was revealed, new elements came to light, but also fueled. The mobilizations of people and youth! If it weren't for the exams would the strike and rallies be less crowded on 28 February? Discourse distortion of reality, with goals that are not present…

However, pressure on the government on the part of the EU, following the intervention of the European Public Prosecutor's Office and the challenge of parliamentary immunity and the law on the responsibility of ministers, which has opened all the debate over whether European law overrides Article 86 of its Constitution. Also, after Karystianos' speeches in the European Parliament, it was decided to remain in operation by the competent EU committees to control the judicial procedure, which, however, is proceeding very quickly, for Greek data.

The question is where. Pressures by the EU do not have the ... pure intention of the administration of justice to a member state that is suffering in this area. But they are moves on the political-geopolitical chessboard, aiming for a member state that is increasingly bound to the chariot of the great transatlantic ally and suffers in the field of ... dedication to the Union.

In any case, the most substantial pressure that can be exerted on the government is by the people through their mobilizations. Because as Karystianos herself said at some point, the justification will be not to happen again. Whatever this means, we will fill in…

Source: https://www.kkeml.gr/ps959/oi-enoxoi-synexizoun-tin-epixeirisi-sygkalypsis/

Medicine for all the disease ... the people pay the marble - KKE (M -L)

Author: ΚΚΕ(μ-λ)
Categories:
Description: The continuity and intensity of policy that will ruin labor rights for health care and the right of the people to free and equal to all care is a given. What we should constantly concern to us is how to build resistance on the part of the popular forces in the direction of getting a barrier to this policy.
Published Time: 2024-03-23T00:00:00+08:00
Tags: ps955
Type: article
Images: 000000.jpg?anchor=center&mode=crop&width=900&rnd=133555407128670000

<The image of this location is in the list above, but in order to protect the site's traffic costs, it cannot be displayed here, sorry.>

The case of the deceased is not unique. On the contrary, it is the usual and describes the regularity of the people as a result of the chronic attack of the system in the popular right to equal, complete and free care. Prime Minister Mr. Mitsotakis is proud of upgrading the NHS by advertising the absorption of funds by the recovery fund for renovation of buildings, while Minister Georgiadis is photographed with the first patient to be operated on afternoon. In fact, Georgiadis argues that only 1% disagree with paid surgeries and the rest of the health and people have been waiting for it for decades!

This is not an attempt to convert white into black. The reality is reality and the people do not chew puppy. However, they are aware of the limits of the political submission of trade unions and reformist forces and have weighted the reaction of the "below". They know, of course, that they cannot have a popular acceptance of a series of measures that make it even more difficult for the labor terms of health care and force the people to put their hand in the pocket even deeper to find their health.

The people will pay a new hike for diagnostic tests per referral. One euro for laboratory and three for imaging, with the aim of repaying clawback. The clawback is essentially money that did not pay doctors and diagnostic centers for exams already performed by EOPYY coverage due to fiscal adjustments. Mitsotakis' successful surpluses at the discretion of the imperialists are robbing the care of the people.

The increases in medicines have already been preceded by paying in addition to the contribution even when the insured receives the cheapest generic (see pp. 957). This, according to the "small" government, unravels the pension of the elderly, who usually take more than one medicine. Especially in cases where the cheaper drug is not even selected, as shortcomings have been normal after the export prohibition has been lifted and pharmacies are supplied by drugs from the dropper warehouses. On the side of them, the payment of five euros for the vaccine for COVID19 in pharmacies is established.

Finally, but certainly not finally as the same policy will continue as long as sufficient popular resistance is formed, the personal physician will be paid. The personal doctor is declared to be a barrier to patients' access to hospitals. Together with the patient's electronic folder, the government is trying to seal the NHS environment to upgrade its ability to restrict access and broaden charges. He stumbled upon both in the reluctance of doctors' participation due to low earnings and intensification. The electronic dossier is proceeding with EU funding and compulsory implementation in hospitals. The obstacle to the non -participation of private doctors due to low earnings is passed by paying the patient the patient. Most likely it is that the patient will not even be able to visit the personal doctor who will refuse to access the hospital. Barrier to the barrier ...

The continuity and intensity of policy that will ruin labor rights for health care and the right of the people to free and equal to all care is a given. What we should constantly concern to us is how to build resistance on the part of the popular forces in the direction of getting a barrier to this policy. Skopelos of sold union leaders and the political line of reformist forces, with the KKE, are recognized obstacles in the development of this direction. But given the general popular discontent, which can fuel significant resistance outbreaks.

Source: https://www.kkeml.gr/ps959/farmako-dia-pasa-noso-o-laos-na-plironei-to-marmaro/

[Menu]#[Previous Article]#[Next]

Outside Greece from the EU! - From the European elections! - KKE (M-L)

Author: ΚΚΕ(μ-λ)
Categories: ΑΝΑΚΟΙΝΩΣΗ ΤΟΥ Π.Γ. ΤΟΥ ΚΚΕ(μ-λ) - Μάρτης 2024
Description: From its initial phase and throughout its journey to its present form, the EU has been and exists as a venture of Europe's imperialists. It is a coalition to serve and promote interests and aspirations before all its imperialist pillars.
Published Time: 2024-03-23T00:00:00+08:00
Tags: ps955
Type: article
Images: 000000.jpg?anchor=center&mode=crop&width=900&rnd=133555427081030000

<The image of this location is in the list above, but in order to protect the site's traffic costs, it cannot be displayed here, sorry.>

The EU is not the peoples, it is the imperialists!

Not in exploitation, poverty and war!

Solidarity - Common Wrust of Workers - Peoples - Migrants/Refugees!

Outside Greece from the EU! - Abstinence from the European elections!

  1. From its initial phase and throughout its journey to its present form, the EU has been and exists as a venture of Europe's imperialists. It is a coalition to serve and promote interests and aspirations before all its imperialist pillars. It is the incomparable contradictions between these imperialist forces that set boundaries in the "unity" of the project, which is anything but historical law. Brexit was a clear manifestation of these contradictions, which today occur between its two main pillars (France-Germany) and are transferred to their satellites, but are also fueled by US involvement in a number of countries and bourgeoisie in today's coalition. of "27".
  5. All of the above are already reflected in the political systems of all EU countries, which are facing the depreciation of the labor-like masses and are shifting in reactionary direction, and with the emergence (even in government roles) of far-right forces. Forces fueled by the general attack on the proletariat and the peoples, by the escalation of politics that stifle freedoms and democratic rights, the policy of wars and preachs of nationalism, hatred and division of peoples. At the same time, in the imperialist countries (France, Germany, but also Italy), the emergence of these far -right forces is also an expression of dissatisfaction with the megalistic class that are squeezed by imperialist competitions and seeking answers by promoting the most aggressive nationalism.

The "great upheaval" in view of the June European elections and the criticality attributed to them by imperialists and bourgeois forces are actually referring to all the above issues. The sovereign forces seek to exploit the Europes as a tool, on the one hand to renovate it - overall in the consciences of the peoples - "idea" of the EU, and on dealing with problems in each country's political systems. It is very characteristic that all far -right forces are zealous in the election campaign and support the "idea" of the EU, without a trace of "isolation". They thus prove again their complete bowing both in the imperialist context and the needs of the bourgeoisie that each is mentioned.

That is why all parties in the system (from the far -right to the so -called center -left) bombard the people demanding to forget, ignore the suffering that has accumulated and accumulates from the country's integration into the EU/EMU, and to seek (with them or with them or other negotiations) in this future! That is why in the name of the "cooperation of the peoples" that the EU is representing, its country and its seas are transformed into a tomb and a prison of the uprooted pieces of peoples, to protect European borders from the oppressed. With the same invocation (of the "cooperation of the peoples"), the country is ordered in a war and hatred position with the peoples of the region to serve its Euro -Atlantic patrons!

  2. Based on all of the above, it is also obvious than the sun that the big struggles, demands and interests of the working-bodies of Europe cannot "meet"-and much more justified-within the prison of the peoples that the people that the people European imperialists have formed and heard in the name of the EU! The class rights and the revolutionary perspective of the masses cannot be expressed in an instrument such as the European Parliament, which is not the conquest of the peoples, but an imperialist construction. In the complaint of this construction and the struggle against the EU lies the path of "meeting" the struggles, the internationalist solidarity, the development of the mass struggle of workers and peoples. This struggle forms the terms of revolutionary perspective to the extent that it is emancipated by the political context defined by the capitalist-imperialist system, to the extent that it refuses to be chased in this political context and opens its own paths.
  3. In our country, prolonged election campaign in view of 9 o
  4. The wide popular aversion and dissatisfaction with the policy of the ND government, the policy of the system and all the parties that support it - from the so -called center -left (SYRIZA, PASOK, Cruise, New Left) and from the far -right (Velopoulos, Niki) - It does not fit into the "official gallop" of the European elections. It should not be perverted by blackmailing the acceptance of imperialist dependence on the EU. The people have no reason to share the upheaval and reactionary processes of the political system. It has every reason to continue on the path of mass struggles and every reason to deny Eurocalp, to abstain from it. Because she The electoral stance corresponds to the promotion of the necessary position "Outside Greece from the EU". Why this electoral attitude highlights the total denial The US and European imperialists, the refusal of the "one -way" of poverty, poverty, exploitation and wars, which ensures the country's dependency.
  5. Based on the position for Abstinence from the European elections We seek coordination with racing, leftist, revolutionary forces in Europe. On the same basis, we also seek in our country the wider promotion of this direction, coordination, co -ordination and jointly forming a political campaign to promote the position "Outside Greece from the EU", for denial and opposition to Europalpe and the reactionary aspirations of the parties and forces of the system.

Source: https://www.kkeml.gr/ps959/ekso-i-ellada-apo-tin-ee-apoxi-apo-tis-eyroekloges/

How many certifications make a high school graduate? - KKE (M-L)

Author: ΚΚΕ(μ-λ)
Categories:
Description: Students' resistance in order not to pass the new measures and to overthrow all anti -populist laws in education is a necessity. Through their 5 -member and 15 -member trade unions, with weapons of general assemblies, occupations and demonstrations, they must make decisions to continue the fight!
Published Time: 2024-03-23T00:00:00+08:00
Tags: ps955
Type: article
Images: 000000.jpg?anchor=center&mode=crop&width=900&rnd=133555365432300000

<The image of this location is in the list above, but in order to protect the site's traffic costs, it cannot be displayed here, sorry.>

The obstacles for the students of the poor and popular layers are multiplying. The government is trying rapidly to unfold the agenda of the attack on schools. It is reported that the National Bachelor's Degree will be "inaugurated" by students who will study in the First High School in the following school year, who will have to face a high school examination of the Pan -Hellenic, with the issues of the Bank and the Bank of Themes in all three classes of the High School. Special gravity coefficient per class (larger in the 3rd and smaller in the 1st High School), while at the same time providing the number of admissions to higher education from the universities. With the law on private universities, the hard class framework continues to be implemented, in which the children of popular families will not only be thrown outside the universities but also by the General High Schools, promoting the government as an alternative to channeling to the Professional education and apprenticeship.

Students' resistance in order not to pass the new measures and to overthrow all anti -populist laws in education is a necessity. Through their 5 -member and 15 -member trade unions, with weapons of general assemblies, occupations and demonstrations, they must make decisions to continue the fight! Next to the students who have given a massive and militant struggle for months so that the Pierrakakis law would not pass. Next to teachers who are terrified because they claim labor rights and crawl in trials for their trade union action. The struggle against the education of the few and the chosen is a matter of struggle for the whole people.

[Menu]#[Previous Article]#[Next]

The intensity of repression cannot "persuade" the youth to submit - KKE (M -L)

Author: ΚΚΕ(μ-λ)
Categories: Διώξεις και απειλές για διαγραφές φοιτητών
Description: The invasion of Police Forces at the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki at the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki at noon on Saturday 16/3 to evacuate the occupations that were held in sections and the arrest of 49 students is a serious example of the system's revanchism.
Published Time: 2024-03-23T00:00:00+08:00
Tags: ps955
Type: article
Images: 000000.jpg?anchor=center&mode=crop&width=900&rnd=133555366337670000

<The image of this location is in the list above, but in order to protect the site's traffic costs, it cannot be displayed here, sorry.>

The invasion of Police Forces at the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki at the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki at noon on Saturday 16/3 to evacuate the occupations that were held in sections and the arrest of 49 students is a serious example of the system's revanchism.

Using damage outside the "Library" in the former biological hangout (which has been evacuated for 2 years since it was evacuated, still ... a library), police forces stormed into the site of the time when action took place as part of the occupation of S. PHI. Geology, arresting mass students, who attributed accusations of disturbing common peace and apathy. Indeed, the arrested students were held in GADTH until Monday 18/3, telling them that "ahead of the 2 months holding the occupation, 2 days of booking are nothing." It is clear that the real reason for this repressive operation is no deterioration of a building or "illegal energy". They were only looking for one occasion, up to that of ... "nuclear rifle", or whatever they could be dug up, to justify the invasion and the brutal repression.

The timing of evacuation and arrests of arrests in the FAI is no accident. In a phase where the student movement is in retreat, the system has found the opportunity to take the "rematch", to hit whatever flaws and resistors have remained in the schools. It is not, after all, the first evacuation of the occupation that the student movement has seen in its two -month struggle against the most voted on Pierrakakis law. The evacuation of the occupation of Law in Komotini, the Law of the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki, and the Rector, a few weeks ago showed government moods. Even at the University of Athens Student Homes (FEPA) they invaded, arresting 3 students and attributing them 3 categories. The system is afraid of the student youth that, for 2 months, is on the streets and is fighting. In particular, it does not tolerate students who, even after the law is passed, insist on getting on the way to overthrow him.

He is called, on the other hand, to put them with his false friends. Under the responsibility of the main reformist forces (KNE-ARIS) who declared a cessation of the movement, but also by all others who see the struggle to overthrow the law as something "utopian", the students who have been motivated by persistence all the time, They were left untouched. On the one hand, they refer to "diverse actions beyond the occupation", which they seem to not even include ... the demonstration. Indeed, in the majority of clubs nationwide, these forces are now rallying the frames of "anti-occupation", while with the force (until not at all) supported solidarity mobilizations to the arrested students. On the other hand, Ara and a series of other forces come out with the flag of "to keep the law on paper". As if we did not see with the minimum introduction base what was happening with the laws that were "left on paper". At some point their system applies them!

So, in these rationales, the student movement must stack its legs and continue the fight for the overthrow of Pierrakakis. Continue with re -General Assemblies, which will make decisions to continue the struggle with new occupations and demonstrations. The student movement has shown that it can overturn even voted laws, and no power - component or reformist - can deny it!

And that is what will be the real response to terrorism and repression. This is what will be the real response to the non -existent accusations of the 49 arrests of the RA and the threats of disciplinary persecution and student deletions. The student movement can only be "protected" and respond to terrorism! With mass general assemblies that will make solidarity decisions to the detainees, they will demand their acquittal and make decisions continued until the victory!

Source: https://www.kkeml.gr/ps959/i-entasi-tis-katastolis-den-mporei-na-peisei-ti-neolaia-na-ypotaxthei/

[Menu]#[Previous Article]#[Next]

Kiev in despair, Europe in confusion, Putin… reinforced - KKE (M -L)

Author: ΚΚΕ(μ-λ)
Categories: Ουκρανία
Description: Ukraine's possible defeat will highlight the weaknesses of Western mechanisms. And this is something that exacerbates a sense of strategic impasse, especially for European imperialists.
Published Time: 2024-03-23T00:00:00+08:00
Tags: ps955
Type: article
Images: 000000.jpg?anchor=center&mode=crop&width=900&rnd=133555365489800000

<The image of this location is in the list above, but in order to protect the site's traffic costs, it cannot be displayed here, sorry.>

Ukraine's possible defeat will highlight the weaknesses of Western mechanisms. And this is something that exacerbates a sense of strategic impasse, especially for European imperialists.

The situation on the Ukrainian front is such that it no longer dictates scenarios for the evolving conflict, but for the next day. Having Moscow the initiative of movement, the agonizing question is not where it will stop, but where it wants to stop. The centers of the West estimate, and justified, that its goals are no longer limited to the border of the four provinces attached.

European (if) security has many versions and varied events. Recently, the timeliness has been monopolized by Macron's threats (lionism), which begin with the "bomb" statement that NATO forces should not be ruled out to Ukraine.

It didn't take much time since June 2022, when Macron stated: ' I am convinced that the role of France is that of a mediating force "! Today, despite his ambiguities and old -fashioned, he constantly throws oil on the fire ... " We are not in a straight conflict with Russia but we cannot let her win », « We are not in war with Russia, but it is waging war against us », « If Russia wins this war, Europe's credibility will be reduced to zero »Etc. For Moscow, such a demonstration of power (albeit rhetoric) by the head of the French state, in addition to a type of bluff, can be considered a "trolley" of Western intentions.

However, Macron's anti -Russian bids may have other extensions. The bourgeoisie has seen its "credibility" decrease in recent years in a traditional sphere of influence: West Africa. Whether the eastern edge of Europe can be a compensatory field of action of French imperialism is very doubtful. However, more or less, Macron tells the countries of A. Europe that France does not have the suspensions of Germany and is willing (and capable?) To replace US guarantees at national or even European level! This intention was updated at the recent trilateral German, France and Poland summit in Berlin.

For his part, German Chancellor Saltz, after clarifying that countries supporting Ukraine are not in war with Russia, was sufficient in Brussels' declarations regarding Europe's help to Ukraine. Is the issue to what extent it controls its three -party government? In the extreme pro -Nursery and anti -Russian statements by Foreign Ministry Berbok (Greens), Germany's Minister of Education Vacinger (Liberals) were added, who, in an interview with the Funke Group newspapers, proposes the preparation of the students (in the context of the pupils). War ... it even imagines it as part of everyday life!

There are not many. Or the West will move towards a complete conflict with Russia or try to halt it by negotiations, mitigating any costs. If the second is true (which does not mean the immediate end of the war), the terms will basically be dictated by Moscow. It is obvious that both sides do not approach a ceasefire in Ukraine in the same way. It is not only that this should start with the acceptance of the new borders and the consolidation of any acquisitions, but they should also respond to their long -term strategic goals. In such a scenario it is estimated that the Russian delegation will reach the table with a sense of strategic advantage. For the Kremlin it is a key condition that the negotiations will not define a new "frozen conflict" or "a break for Ukraine re -equipment".

The Russian president (who was not particularly struggling for his re -election) does not seem to put the consultations on the forefront. In his public festive speech (on his election victory and the anniversary of Crimea's attachment), he reiterated warnings to the West for the use of nuclear in any "official" development of Western troops in Ukrainian territories. These Putin warnings are not made in the void. The background is long -term and the controversy exceeds the borders of Ukraine. It became clear by Russia that a possible West-Russia negotiation would not be limited to its "territorial" as its future neutrality and demilitarization. And may require safeguards concerning all A. Europe

In the estimation of Western analysts, it appears that the US would be enough for Russia to leave Ukraine without other territorial conquests. Putin's appeal is considered to be the dismissal of Nuland, number 3 to the State Department, with a field of responsibility in Ukraine for at least ten years. However, this action could also be considered an indirect assumption of Russia's achievements in Ukraine!

All of this reflect fears of the correlations that are going to be shaped, as developments, and the uncertain of their end in both the battlefields in Ukraine but also gauze as well as throughout the Middle East. There are uncertain parameters that form an unprecedented situation, raising more issues of re -evaluation of imperialist relations. A state of fine balances, reflecting the interests of the dominant imperialists both peripheral and the world stage as a whole.

A situation that, highlighting its multifaceted dynamics, may be the reason for the inevitable and violent adjustment of US strategies and priorities. A situation where "continued politics by other means" will tend to become a rule.

XB

Source: https://www.kkeml.gr/ps959/to-kievo-se-apognosi-i-eyropi-se-sygxysi-o-poutin-enisxymenos/

[Menu]#[Previous Article]#[Next]

PC 22 March - 23 March 1944 - 23 March 2024: 80 years from the heroic action of the gap in via Rasella

Author: maoist
Description: After the fall of the fascist regime and the formation of the Badoglio government in Rome some divisions of the Royal Army had merged: the 8th set ...
Published Time: 2024-03-23T00:38:00+08:00
Images: 000000.jpg 000001.jpg 000002.jpg 000003.jpg

After the fall of the fascist regime and the formation of the Badoglio government in Rome had merged Some divisions of the Royal Army: the armistice is signed on 8 September, At dawn of 9 September the king, badoglio and the high military positions They abandoned the capital and the army found themselves without directives. A part of soldiers tried to counter the German army and, together with organized civilians from the anti -fascist parties, he stands at Porta S. Paolo where you resist as long as the Sopricant German military force is right of the resistants.

Rome falls Under the control of Nazi occupiers that between 1943 and 1944 they submitted the population to terror, massacres, torture.

It is in this context that the action of via Rasella is inserted: on that occasion, the groups of patriotic action succeeded in a courageous military operation that he saw the assault on a Nazi battalion marching on the streets of the center, leading to the killing of 33 SS soldiers. The Nazi retaliation to this event was, as sadly known, the massacre of the Fosse Ardeatine in which 335 prisoners killed.

In the years There were several attempts to criminalize the action of via Rasella da part of the historical revisionists - up to the "externation" of La Russa della last year: "Via Rasella was a anything but noble page of the resistance, those killed were a semi-thin and non-semi-thought band Nazis of the SS, knowing very well the risk of retaliation on citizens Romans, anti -fascists and not ».

Always, bravely and consistently the protagonists of the action have The partisan resistance defended the attempts to criminalize them. They left us memorable pages on Roman resistance.

We resume Here the biographical notes taken from the ANPI website of some of the protagonists:

Rosario Bentivegna

Silver medal at the valor Military

Born in Rome on June 22, 1922, doctor, Died in Rome on April 2, 2012. Silver medal for military valor.

Already in the high school years he was an anti -fascist assets. With Leonardo Jannaccone, Corrado Nourian and Nino Baldini constituted, in 1939, a group called "Marxist unification", which he attracted soon The attention of the fascist police. Arrested in 1941, after release Bentivegna joined the Communist Party in 1943. With the armistice and the training of the patriotic action groups, he was among the most valiant protagonists of the Resistance, both in Rome (assault on German soldiers in Piazza Barberini, Attack on a fascist procession in via Tomacelli) that in the Casilina area, where he commanded partisan formations.
On March 23, 1944 with Carla Capponi (That He would then be his wife), he was among the authors of the Action of via Rasella , who put out fight 33 SS soldiers and which was the pretext for the massacre of Had ardeatine. A few months after the liberation of the capital, Bentivegna he decided to continue his fight against the Nazi -fascists in Yugoslavia e in Montenegro .
Returned to Italy after the conclusion of the conflict, this valiant fighter (who for a couple of years was also the editor of the newspaper the unit , Before resuming their studies and dedicating himself to the profession of doctor), he is was subjected to his partisan companies to numerous processes, come on which has always been acquitted for the legitimacy of his actions.

Mario Fiorentini

Silver medal at the valor Military

Born in Rome on 7 November 1918, died in Rome on 9 August 2022. Mathematical and university professor, multidecto to military valor.

He was still a commercial student when he began to carry out clandestine activity in "justice and freedom" and in the party Communist. After July 25, 1943, he gave birth to other anti -fascists Romans, to the "Arditi del Popolo" formation. September 9 Fiorentini took part in the fights against the Germans in Porta San Paolo e In October '43 he formed and directed the central gaps " A. Gramsci "And" Carlo Pisacane ", with the battle name of "Giovanni", operating in the 4th area of Rome. In this role He participated, in the capital, in numerous actions, including those of via Rasella e at the Regina Coeli prison. After the liberation of Rome, he made himself parachute North. With the battle name of "Dino" he worked in Liguria, Emilia, Lombardy and Piedmont, as an OSS officer, the service American secret. Was decorated with three silver medals at the valor military and three war crosses of merit, and with the special force medal (GB) and the Donovan of the OSS (USA). Self -taught, after the war has started, supported by his wife ( Lucia Ottabrini , a known anti -fascist during clandestinity), high school studies and then university studies. Fiorentini thus became a teacher of geometry superior to the University of Ferrara. His math studies have been resumed and deepened in everything The world and have made the former Gappista an internationally renowned mathematician.

Carla Capponi

Gold medal for military valor

Born in Rome on 7 December 1921, Decease in Zagarolo (Rome), on November 23, 2000, gold medal at valor military.

Heart of a woman .

Source: https://proletaricomunisti.blogspot.com/2024/03/pc-22-marzo-23-marzo-1944-23-marzo-2024.html

PC March 22 - exploited migrants - Al Jazeera is right ... while the Italian press often is silent

Author: maoist
Description: Al Jazeera's investigation: "Migrants exploited and mistreated in the lands of Barolo and Barbaresco" in the investigation is told, among others, ...
Published Time: 2024-03-23T00:43:00+08:00
Images:

Al Jazeera's investigation: "Migrants exploited and mistreated in the lands of Barolo and Barbaresco"

In the investigation The story of Sajo, a 36 -year -old from Gambia, is told. According to his testimony, there would be several workers without Documents that work in the vineyards of Barolo and Barbaresco

Migrant workers exploited and mistreated In the Piedmontese vineyards dedicated to precious wine. The complaint comes Directly from Al Jazeera, the network based in Qatar. More in the specific in the article entitled "Migrant World Exploited, Abused in Italy's prized end winyards ", where, among others, the history of Sajo, a 36 year old from Gambia . According to his testimony, there would be several workers without documents that work for 12 hours In the vineyards of Barolo and Barbaresco (Where a hectare of up to 1.5 million the price of one hectare), for a pay that It goes from 3 to 4 euros per hour. Not only. The man also denounces several episodes of racism, in addition to working conditions defined as "inhuman".

Sajo claims to have Found work in Alba , During the grape season, when new workforce is needed. As soon as descended from the train was approached by a man, who offered him a job in the vineyards with a pay of 3 euros per hour . He accepted and settled in a small improvised camp that others

African winemakers had built in the woods, on the river bank. They had no toilets, either running water or electricity. When they could not afford the bottled water, they used the muddy one of the river to wash and cook.


“It was the most difficult time since I left the Gambia - Sajo recalls - I couldn't even Recharge the phone to call the house ». Every day he woke up before dawn and went to the train station, where a corporal loaded him And the others on a van and brought them to the hills to the vineyards. The workers were constantly supervised And “We couldn't take breaks to go to the bathroom or drink water. There They threatened to fire us if we had slowed down or we talked. "

Source: https://proletaricomunisti.blogspot.com/2024/03/pc-22-marzo-migranti-sfruttati-al.html

Images: 000000.jpg?ssl=1 000001.jpg?ssl=1 000002.jpg?ssl=1

Celebrate historic 23rd March as Anti-Imperialist Day in the immortal revolutionaries' memories of Comrades Bhagat Singh, Sukdev, and Rajguru. _ Communist Party of India (Maoist)

Author: maoistroad
Description: Let us defeat Imperialism. Let us smash Brahmanical Hindutva Fascism. Let us continue our struggle to fulfill the dreams of all great martyr...
Published Time: 2024-03-23T01:07:00+08:00
Images:


Let us defeat Imperialism. Let us smash Brahmanical Hindutva Fascism.
Let us continue our struggle to fulfill the dreams of all great martyrs of freedom
movement and let us fight for a New Democratic India.



In our long history of people's democratic struggle, 23rd March hold a specific revolutionary place in the
history of class struggle for all those hearts that beats for a just - equitable society, and at the same time that
despises Imperialism vehemently. On 23rd March, Comrades Bhagat Singh, Sukhdev, and Rajguru were hanged by the
British colonial power in order to crush the ongoing anti-colonial freedom movement. They were influenced by the
success of Bolshevik revolution that had left overwhelming impact on these three Indian revolutionaries that led to
the formation of HSRA (Hindustan Socialist Revolutionary Association). In the formation of HSRA Comrade Baghat
Singh played a fundamental role, and he clearly stated that ruling classes whether of white skin or black skin, we
have to continue our struggle against the loot and plunder of all exploiters. But the same exploiters who colluded
with the imperialists forces are today celebrating their martyrdom and particularly the leadership of RSS who bitterly
opposed Bhagat Singh and his cause. Today BJP the political organ of RSS is upholding all freedom fighters including
Com. Bhagat Singh and his comrades. They have no moral right to even speak about freedom fighters and to hijack
the freedom movement and now they are distorting it. Our Party CPI (Maoist) pays its revolutionary homage to them
and will fight for the fulfillment of their revolutionary dreams.
After the formal independence in 1947 India became a semi-colonial country, and the Indian ruling classes:
comprador big bourgeois and big landlord continued to serve their imperial masters without any hesitation. Entire
economic policies of the Indian ruling classes after 1947, was designed to serve the interest of imperialism and
native elites. Comprador bourgeois and landlord classes as the owners of the significant number of means of
production of the country implemented distorted development industrial policy that benefits them, and their
Imperialist bosses. Emphasis on industrial policy was to assist the needs of the 1 percent of elite population of India.
With the entry of finance capital (both in the form of loans and investments) vast scale of dispossession and
displacement of the oppressed people happened on an unprecedented manner. Toiling masses of India continued to
face unbridled exploitation in more intense manner than before. After 1990s, under the dictates of imperialist forces,
Indian ruling classes implemented Liberalization, globalization, and Privatization policies in the country. This measure
was a cakewalk for the foreign imperialist capital to loot and plunder the Indian resources, and to accumulate more
and more profits. All parliamentary mainstream political parties, irrespective of their party flags have flawlessly
implemented LPG policies. This has broken the backbone of Indian economy and has caused unspeakable misery to
the toiling masses.
After BJP came to power in 2014 under the leadership of Narendra Modi, it has turned India into an open
field for the loot and plunder of the country by the foreign capital under the flagship programs of Make in India,
Digital India, One Nation-One Tax, Start- UP India, and many other flagship programs. BJP has enacted several pro-
imperialist policies that are against the interest of the board masses of the country. At one hand it is handing over
the resources of the country to foreign MNCs, and at the same time it is spreading religious enmity in the country
through its agenda of Hindu Rashtra. Com. Bhagat Singh was absolutely against all pro-imperialist policies and
communal ideology from which RSS and BJP orginated. Bhagat Singh was totally against Hindu-Rashtra or the idea ofnation based on religion or race. He upholds the idea of scientific reasoning, secularism, and socialism. But, today
the Brahmanical Hindutva forces are distorting com. Bhagat Singh ideas to fulfill its agenda of Hindu Rashtra.
Development in India happens by the usurpation of the lands from the oppressed people. Imperialism to come out
from the general crisis look for cheap natural resources that are available in the third world countries. India has
abundant deposits of natural resources that mainly lie in the tribal belts of central and Eastern India. To plunder the
resources of India, Imperialism has backed every fascist onslaught of its pliant state on the indigenous people of
India. To crush the revolutionary Maoist movement in India, the Indian ruling classes in collaboration with the
imperialist carried out several fascist counter-insurgency programs like Salwa Judum, Sendera, Operation Green-
Hunt, Operation Samadhan, and now it has unleashed Operation Kagaar. All these fascist genocide of indigenous
people was funded, directed and aspired by the global finance and Comprador bureaucratic Capital. In its crisis
ridden state, Imperialism has become ferocious, and has given rise to fascist political system in India. Massive
deployments of military forces are going on in Central India to expedite the plunder of the natural resources from
the Adivasi region. People's resistance to corporatization and militarization of their villages, lands, and forest are
being brutally crushed by the Indian state under the BJP'S rule. Every day newspapers in Chhattisgarh carry horrific
news of killings of Adivasi by the police forces. It is not happening for the first time, and neither is going to stop until
and unless this moribund system of loot and plunder is uprooted from India. The very foundation of capitalism is laid
on the massacre of the indigenous population in Africa and in Latin-America. Imperialism in 21st century has
developed more brutal machines and deadly weapons to unleash massacres on the struggling masses. Today, the
people of India (especially in Central and Eastern India) under the leadership of CPI (Maoist) are fighting against this
enemy's machines and methods.
Central Committee of CPI (Maoist) gives a call to all democratic, patriotic, working- class, peasantry, dalits, and
women's organizations, well- wishers of the adivasi, students, writers, teachers, lawyers and human rights activists
to celebrate 23rd March as an Anti-Imperialism with revolutionary spirit and enthusiasm. It also appeals to conduct
seminars, meetings, rallies upholding the ideals of comrades Bhagat Singh, Sukhdev and Rajguru in order to expose the
treacherous design of the hindutva forces to saffronize Bhagat Singh and his comrades.


Down with Imperialism!
Down with Brahmanical Hindutva Fascism!
Long Live Marxism-Leninism-Maoism!
Long Live Comrade Bhagat Singh, Comrade Sukdev, and Comrade Rajguru!
Inquilab Zindabad!


With Revolutionary Greetings,
Pratap
Spokesperson
Central Regional Bureau
Communist Party of India (Maoist)

Source: https://maoistroad.blogspot.com/2024/03/celebrate-historic-23rd-march-as-anti.html

CDMX Actions by Dr. SERNAS GARCÍA

Author: SolRojista (Person)
Description: Our colleagues in Mexico City have carried out some actions in demand for life of Dr. Ernesto Sernas ...
Published Time: 2024-03-23T01:27:00+08:00
Images: 000000.jpeg 000001.jpg 000002.jpeg




Our Companions from Mexico City have carried out some actions in demand of life with life of Dr. Ernesto Sernas García, disappeared from the May 10, 2018 in San Agustín de las Boards, Oaxaca.

From On August 30, 2018, the Red Sol People has launched a campaign International, permanent, until we find our buddy.

Of this way #DrsrnasPrenaCiónVida It covers streets, communities and cities, jumping from Mexico to other countries.



He Next May, 6 years of forced disappearance of Dr. Sernas will be and our democratic organization will be carrying out actions in different points, accompanied by class solidarity and internationalism proletarian of other voices that in Mexico and the world will join ours:

Ernesto Sernas Garcia, presentation with life!

Because I live They took him, we live it!

#DrsrnasPrenaCiónVida

[Menu]#[Previous Article]#[Next]

PC 22 March - Bologna. Students uploaded by the police, ... by now the Meloni/Salvini/Planted government has declared war on the students who protest

Author: maoist
Description: They contested Minister Bernini and the agreements between University and Israel in the central Via Indipendenza of Bologna the ...
Published Time: 2024-03-23T01:46:00+08:00
Images: 000000.jpg 000001.jpg 000002.jpg
They contested Minister Bernini and the agreements between University and Israel

In the Very central via Indipendenza of Bologna, the police today loaded and Pushed university students for days in mobilization.

Yesterday In Bologna, university students had protested in front of the Academic Senate to ask for the end of the censorship against those who mobilize against the war in Palestine, to demand the boycott of agreements with Israel and the military sector industrial.

The Academic Senate refused to terminate the agreements in the field military and war, expressing himself with yet another vaga formula e smoky, substantially reiterating the need to respect the regulations and the ethical code which, as regards the dual use, yes I limit to "minimizing any damage" ...

“ We want And we demand a concrete commitment of the University that goes to terminate All agreements with the Leonardo group, with NATO and with the partners of the Zionist government of Israel ”wrote the Students to change the course of the Bolognese university.

“ The mobilizations in our country show that getting the boycott is possible and we can do it only through the struggle, as happened yesterday to the academic Senate of the University of Turin, where thanks to the mobilization has been able to obtain non -participation of the Torinese University to the new Maeci of cooperation tender between Italy and Israel".

But Today Minister Bernini arrived in Bologna for the inauguration of the academic year and the students mobilized to do hear, also in light of the Minister's statements against Students and teachers of the University of Turin who have decided to interrupt the collaboration with the Israeli institutions.

The procession of the students who arrived in via Indipendenza tried to reach the headquarters of the Manzoni Theater where the ceremony took place with Minister Bernini, but found a deployment against him of the police who soon went to the de facto roads by loading e pushing the students. The procession reappeared the files and is directed in a university area.

There protest was also revealed within the theater where it was present A group of students with the Palestine flag. Francesca representative of the Student Council, intervened shortly before of the intervention of the Minister of the University, Anna Maria Bernini, with Kefiah around the neck. “For months we have been witnessing the systemic censorship of voices from the Palestinian community and what are the requests of student mobilizations ”denounced the Student.

Source: https://proletaricomunisti.blogspot.com/2024/03/pc-22-marzo-bologna-studenti-caricati.html

[Menu]#[Previous Article]#[Next]

On the occasion of the 25th anniversary of NATO bombings - the 1997 Party of Work Party - Party of Labor

Author: admin33
Categories: Rezolucija
Description: NATO troops, together with their political staffs are on the territory of Yugoslavia, distributed in BiH, Croatia and Macedonia. The NATO Pact created American imperialists in cooperation with the Imperialists of Western Europe in 1947. Concerned about the great victories of the Soviet Union, the creation of the Socialist Tabor, the victory of the Red Army in China and the more powerful anticolonial and anti-primerial movement in
Modified Time: 2024-03-22T17:56:43+00:00
Published Time: 2024-03-23T01:46:57+08:00
Tags:
Type: article
Images: 000000.jpg?resize=640%2C554&ssl=1

NATO troops, together with their political staffs are on the territory of Yugoslavia, distributed in BiH, Croatia and Macedonia.

The NATO Pact created American imperialists in cooperation with the Imperialists of Western Europe in 1947. Concerned about the great victories of the Soviet Union, the creation of the Socialist Tabor, the victory of the Red Army in China and the most more powerful anti-Colonial and anti-primerial movements in the third world countries, as an aggressive military block against the Soviet Union, China and Liberation Movements in Colonies. From the very beginning of his creation he formed as a stroke military fist, which was supposed to won the Soviet Union and other socialist countries militarily and to restore capitalism in them. Direct NATO interventions in Vietnam, Latin America and Africa are known.

At the end of the 1980s, the Soviet Union and the Warsaw Pact was disbanded, and the countries in the composition of the Soviet Union, as well as the countries of Eastern Europe, liquidated socialism and went through the restoration of capitalism.

When the main opponent of the NATO Pact was disappeared - Warsaw Pact, it seemed to be normal to dissolve the NATO Pact. Instead, the NATO pact is even more reinforced, conveniently, the most perfect types of weapons and increased the military budgets of the NATO member. Using economically, diplomatic, political and military pressure makes everything to expand, not only to all countries of Eastern Europe, but also on all the countries of the former Soviet Union and thus reaches Russia's borders. It is the goal of being completely insulate that Russia, they put it on their knees and the countries of the former Soviet Union create a kind of semi-coloni, to use their huge natural resources unobstructed, to gain abundance of cheap labor and spacious market. It is obvious that the NATO pact remains an aggressive military force of imperialism and it seems everything in order to provide the rule of imperialism throughout the world, but only to economic and financial resources in the world's military force.

NATO Pact is the reactionary military force of American imperialism, the most dangerous enemy of the socialism and the people of the third world countries.

Why did NATO's troops come to Yugoslavia?

The United States and the NATO Pact, after the collapse of the Soviet Union, the other only superpowers, the only global force in the world. One of the strategic goals of the United States and the NATO is not allowed to get out of the events in the world to escape their control and start developing their influence or against them. They still watched the war in Slovenia, Croatia for several years, and especially in BiH, they did not consider to intervene. However, they concluded that the continuation of the war in BiH would inevitably led to its expansion to Kosovo, Macedonia and the entire Balkans and to enter Turkey and Greece, two important NATO members against the other. The NATO Pact then decided to send troops and stop the war in BiH. They forced Milosevic and Tudjman to sign the Dayton Agreement.

One other element seriously influenced that the application of the Dayton Agreement, as well as the intention to resolve Kosovo and enable longer and more stable peace in the Balkans. The rush of the United States and NATO is caused by the possibility of "exploding" Turkey soon, and with it the entire East, they may be found in the war with the entire Muslim world that now counts about a billion and one hundred million people.

What is the attitude of the work party in connection with the presence of NATO in Yugoslavia?

Party of Labor considers that this should be considered without emotion and assess whether the presence of NATO is used in the NATO presence or harms the people of Yugoslavia. The team before there were cases in history when the interests of the imperialist, if it was a joint enemy, could coincide with the interests of the people. This happened in the Second World War when the Soviet Union concluded a pact with the two largest imperialistic forces of that time - the United States and English for the fight against the common enemy of Hitler's German.

Unfortunately, nationalism affects wide masses in Yugoslavia. Greater Serbian and Great Rhine Chauvinists, in fact, with their policy of the war and endangering the U.S. and NATO global interests and NATO's arrival in Yugoslavia. The fact is that in Yugoslavia, just because of these widespread nationalist consciousness, they could not organize forces that would oppose the disastrous, chauvinist politics of Milosevic and Tudjman. The fact is that they did not arrive NATO troops and the force of their weapons stopped war, would probably have been thousands of thousands of dead, new destruction and new crimes during the two years.

The act of stopping the war was positive. Efforts to apply the Dayton Agreement, ensure the unique BiH, return all refugees to their homes and that the penalties of war criminals, the PR is considered the interest in the people of Yugoslavia. Application of the Dayton Agreement and resolving Kosovo issues A missing blow to the Great Serbian conquerable war policy, and the nationalism in Yugoslavia, which was the main substrate of that policy. That is why the PR in this situation is not against the presence of NATO for now, because at this moment it is in the interest of the people of Yugoslavia.

But, if even after the establishment of peace in BiH and resolving these basic problems, NATO troops will be remained in Yugoslavia, the Party of the work will be considered for occupiers, which will really be. Then the PR as a true patriotic party will organize a political and other fight against NATO presence, all the way to the armed fight for the liberation of the Earth from the occupier.

Source: https://partijarada.org/povodom-25-godina-od-nato-bombradovanja-rezolucija-partije-rada-iz-1997-godine/

One more sample of the need to conquer class independence in the trade union movement | Workers Revolution

Author: Revolución Obrera
Description: Meanwhile, the CUT Congress did give him a decision and by delegates, with the aggravating man who arrived the documents already made and machine
Modified Time: 2024-03-22T13:00:00-05:00
Published Time: 2024-03-23T02:00:00+08:00
Section: Reestructuración
Tags: Central Sindical Revolucionaria, Centrales Sindicales, CUT, reestructuración del movimiento sindical
Type: article
Images: 000000.jpg

A few weeks ago the VIII Cong Congress was held in the city of Bogotá, prior to this, the Congress of Youth and that of CUT women was held.

Meanwhile, the Cut Congress did give him a decision and by delegates, with the aggravating man who arrived the documents already made and machine to show a majority that approved them. They also invited the Minister of Labor and the Deputy Minister, despite being criticized by the base workers, because although they were unionists, they are now part of the State institutions that are at the service of the capitalists regardless of their intentions.

It is obvious that, if they do not allow them to speak to those who dare to criticize, union democracy is not being exercised, and a always majority approves the conclusions that are already machined from above. In this way, the new delegates, especially from other cities, believe that this is the way of working in the trade union movement, ignoring that union democracy is too much from being that, because the minority must be allowed to defend their positions.

That is why trade unionism, managed by bourgeois ideology does not serve the collective interests of the working class, so far it has only served to promote those bureaucrats in state positions, it has served for many leaders to turn the union into their Minor box, while the workers are orphaned and at the mercy of what the patterns want to do with them.

That is why from these pages we have been denouncing that bourgeois policy of conciliation and concertation of classes, which are precisely the foundations of the CUT.

In the political statement that presented as a final conclusion of the VIII Congress, it is claimed that the salary increase approved for this year was an achievement. Surely none of those bureaucrats earns a minimum wage, nor do they have The most brutal persecution for the bosses, most of the CUT bureaucracy no longer feels what it is to live with a pyrric minimum wage. That is, these bureaucracies do not represent the majority as they know, and do deceive and handle the workers preventing them from organizing with class independence and building their own organizations.

The political statement of the CUT is just one more speech, but what they defend there is pure demagogy; That bureaucracy has become a machinery that does not allow it to be changed from the inside, it is similar to a tiny state, impossible to change because the State since it was created has the function of guaranteeing the privileges of the classes that have economic power, And in the case of the CUT, from birth it was tied by the ideology and politics of the bourgeoisie, which made it the engendro that is today.

It is an immediate need for trade union organizations to cease to be behind a trade that can do the bureaucracies of union plants. The trade union movement must fight for their organization with independence of class and from the streets, with the complaint and protest to tear the vindications of the people to the bourgeoisie; But it is essential to act organized and centralized, under principles that represent its class, which returns to solidarity strikes.

But this must be worked as aware and with a lot of commitment, understanding that the claims are solved collectively, really organized in independent federations, that they are the foundations of a true independent central for its ideology and politics at the service of workers and not of employers , a central one that directs the struggle of workers in improving their conditions, but not to stay as salaried slaves, but to have the strength to fight against capitalism, against wage exploitation and the construction of a new society, socialism .

Advance the restructuring of the trade union movement!

Source: https://revolucionobrera.com/reestructuracion/sindical-4/

No more war against the indigenous people | Workers Revolution

Author: Revolución Obrera
Description: Since Saturday, March 16, several acts of violence against the NASA community have been presented in the rural area of the municipality of Toribío (Cauca), there it was
Modified Time: 2024-03-22T13:00:56-05:00
Published Time: 2024-03-23T02:00:45+08:00
Section: Actualidad política
Tags: Cauca, cultivos ilícitos, discidencias de las Farc, guerra contra el pueblo, Gustavo Petro, Parmilitares, Paz total
Type: article
Images: 000000.jpg

The day I die, the day I am not in the territory, you do not stay there, do not be afraid to die. After they are fighting with their hands, with their cane, it is the greatest pride they can have, not like them, that they are cowards who hold a weapon and with that weapon they want to intimidate us, but no, do not let themselves bend, be they brave, talk «, Said María Teresa about the legacy left by her mother Carmelina.

Since Saturday, March 16, several acts of violence against the NASA community have been presented in the rural area of the municipality of Toribío (Cauca), there was killed the indigenous leader Carmelina Yule Paví, 52, was injured when he accompanied Members of the Indigenous Guard to rescue a minor who had forced to be recruited by the Dagoberto Ramos Front of the Central General Staff (EMC) of the FARC dissidents. Subsequently, the Indigenous Community and Guard rescued 2 girls who had been kidnapped. During the funeral of Mayora Carmelina, they were again victims of armed harassment by the same armed group.

NASA women's song against forced recruitment

https://www.facebook.com/share/r/YEi66peN3qHcAjYZ/?mibextid=oFDknk

The armed conflict generates massacres, forced recruitment, is favored by the lack of opportunities in education and work. The abandonment of the field by the State, leads rural communities to poverty; In particular, children and young people become cannon fodder, due to the war for the dispute of the gain of coca, poppy and marijuana crops.

This reactionary war, made by the different armed groups such as the paramilitaries, the armed forces of the State, the dissidents of the FARC, the ELN and common crime groups, has cost the lives of thousands of young people for decades and although in the new Government promotes the speech of "total peace", the war continues in the field, pointing to the extermination of the communities.

With this action, the decomposition of dissidents is demonstrated since they do not have a political base ennobled by socialism, which guides its cause against the enemies of the people; On the contrary, they have become a poster rather than massacra to their own people.

Hence, the requirement for the Government to meet its promises to generate sources of employment, to deliver land to the communities, provide the conditions for free and quality education for primary, secondary and university.

The most urgent demands in this situation to Petro's government:

  • That the government protects the life of communities within the territories.
  • After the suspension of the bilateral and temporary ceasefire agreement in the departments of Cauca, Nariño and Valle del Cauca. Which means that the government resumes military actions against the dissent of the FARC, it is necessary that the indigenous guard be recognized as a government of territorial control of all regions with the legal and legislative legal, political, political rights.
  • Change illicit crops for lawful: that the production of coca and marijuana crops is legalized since they have become an industry where the profits are carried by local and foreign investors and it is the communities that put the dead.
  • That university academic training is promoted by building universities in the 10 departments of the South West.
  • That sources of employment are generated based on agricultural and technified mining production to take care of the environment, a situation that would avoid the migration of young people to the cities in search of employment and especially not to be part of the armed groups becoming perpetrators of His own communities.
We reject Carmelina's murder.
No more kidnapping of young people, or forced recruitment.
Below the war against the people.
Neither the State, nor the politicians, only the people saves the people.


Source: https://revolucionobrera.com/actualidad/indigena/
